scripts.docker-rebuild: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml rm -fsv && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml build
scripts.docker-rebuild:frontend: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml rm -fsv frontend && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml build --no-cache frontend
scripts.docker-rebuild:backend: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml rm -fsv backend && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml build --no-cache backend
scripts.install-packages: npm run install:root && npm-run-all install:backend install:frontend
scripts.build-app:dev: npm run install-packages && npm run docker-rebuild
